basics.name: Senior Special Investigator
basics.label: Insurance Fraud Specialist
basics.summary: To work within a successful Special Investigation Unit and work effectively with others. Skilled investigative professional with over 40 years experience in the industry, extensive knowledge in combating fraud and conducting training sessions, particularly within the insurance sector.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Conducted complex possible fraudulent insurance claims investigations for the Specialty Group of Great American. These claims are within their Workers Comp Unit, Liability Unit, Property Claims, Agriculture Claims, Equine Claims and Tractor-Trailer claims units.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Conducted investigations into suspicious insurance claims relating to Bodily Injury Accidents, First Party Auto Theft, Burglary, Vandalism, Property theft and etc.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Conducted complex insurance fraud investigations. Monitored out of the area investigations by Private Investigation Companies on Unitrin Insurance products.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: In charge of 3 & 4 different offices of the Special Investigation Unit for Continental Insurance including supervision of investigators and support staff.

certificates.name: Certified Insurance Fraud Investigator (CIFI)
certificates.issuer: International Association of Special Investigation Units (IASIU)
